Gift for Bloodkin.name: Gift for Bloodkin
Gift for Bloodkin.baseEffect:
Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
Summon a Forest Bat for both leaders.
Gift for Bloodkin.baseFlair: Hey, can I make you my bloodkin too? —Vania, Vampire Princess

Urias's Revelry.name: Urias's Revelry
Urias's Revelry.baseEffect: Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader.
Urias's Revelry.baseFlair: Finally... Allow me to revel in this battle. I feel most alive when dancing between life and death—I want for nothing else! Come, waltz with me. Lose yourself in the thrill. I do hope you won't give me a lackluster performance.

Mono's Resolve.name: Mono's Resolve
Mono's Resolve.baseFlair: I shall join the fray. Even if it does worry me so... You see—fragile is the steel flower which wilts upon a single screw. Rough treatment just doesn't become me. Sigh. I suppose I'll just have to rise past all that. And enjoy what life I've got left.

Restless Parish.name: Restless Parish
Restless Parish.baseEffect:
If you have at least 2 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Night Fall or Madness Revealed.
----------
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Last Words: Draw a card.
Restless Parish.baseFlair: Just as sleep finds itself wrapped in dreams, you are embraced by the night. If you cower in fear of the darkness, the night will forgive your transgressions. But, alas, you seem none the wiser of its terrors—and there is only one end suitable for the ignorant.

Ambling Wraith.name: Ambling Wraith
Ambling Wraith.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
Ambling Wraith.baseFlair: A shadow born from human hatred. This parasite warps the spirit and then feeds on it, sapping life force to boost its own dark power.
Ambling Wraith.evoFlair: As long as hatred remains in the world, dark shadows will grow ever longer and more powerful. They will one day manifest as a pure terror condemning all light and hope to the darkness.

Silverbolt Hunter.name: Silverbolt Hunter
Silverbolt Hunter.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Last Words: Give +1/+1 to a random allied follower.
Silverbolt Hunter.evoEffect: Last Words: Give +1/+1 to a random allied follower.
Silverbolt Hunter.baseFlair: I'll let you bloodsuckers in on a secret. Humans may be weak, but we don't fly solo. Mankind stands united, and that spells your inevitable doom.
Silverbolt Hunter.evoFlair: I'm not naive. I know one arrow isn't going to faze you fiends. But if you think that's going to stop me from letting off these bolts, think again.

Forest Bat.name: Forest Bat
Forest Bat.baseFlair: A shadow moves soundlessly through the black night, seeking out its master's enemies.
Forest Bat.evoFlair: A fanged shadow glides soundlessly through the black night, its master's enemies in sight.

Serpent.name: Serpent
Serpent.baseFlair:
"It doesn't look very tasty."
"Not worth the effort to kill it."
"I don't think so either—but let's go ahead and do it in!"
—The three gorgon sisters
Serpent.evoFlair:
"It looks gross. I'll pass."
"I have no interest in it either, I'm afraid."
"Okay! Well, then leave it to my little pet!"
—The three gorgon sisters

Cursebrand Vampire.name: Cursebrand Vampire
Cursebrand Vampire.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain +1/+1 if Vengeance is active for you.
Cursebrand Vampire.baseFlair: Only a bloodbath of unforgettable proportions will be enough to awaken this demonsword. So I'll kill and kill some more.
Cursebrand Vampire.evoFlair: The tide of blood and death is rising, and the time of the blade's awakening is upon us. So let us continue the slaughter until rivers of blood flow beneath mountains of flesh!

Buller, Blood Maiden.name: Buller, Blood Maiden
Buller, Blood Maiden.baseEffect: If you have at least 5 play points, Choose: Play this card as a Buller, Saintly Maiden or Buller, Dark Maiden.
Buller, Blood Maiden.baseFlair: My wings' true form lies somewhere in the middle. I am a saintly maiden—yet so too am I a maiden of darkness.
Buller, Blood Maiden.evoFlair: "A pact of white, and pact of ebon. In this moment destiny is mine to select!" "Mrrrow now, what are you getting yourself into?"

Disciple of Lust.name: Disciple of Lust
Disciple of Lust.baseEffect:
Strike: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Last Words: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Disciple of Lust.baseFlair: Go forth and convulse en masse, for love is but an illusion, a ravenous phantom that endlessly devours reason. Cast down this adoration, discrimination, and division.
Disciple of Lust.evoFlair:
The Second Provision: Love Not
Inamorato, inamorata—the greater the affection, the greater the hindrance to our cause. Know your fellows not as lovers but as partners. —Teachings from the Manor of Lust

Lucius, Vampire Slayer.name: Lucius, Vampire Slayer
Lucius, Vampire Slayer.baseEffect:
Fanfare: If there are at least 4 enemy cards in play, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +5/+5 and Bane.
Lucius, Vampire Slayer.evoEffect: Evolve: Destroy an enemy follower with X defense or less. X equals 20 minus your leader's defense.
Lucius, Vampire Slayer.baseFlair: My first battle was waged in vengeance against the goblins. Next, I plunged into the fray as an agent. If never-ending battle is my lot, then let my blade be the bane of a thousand fiends!
Lucius, Vampire Slayer.evoFlair:
Teena: I'm worried about Lucius. He's always throwing himself into dangerous situations...

Feena: Yeah, I really wish he'd settle down a bit.

Executioner's Axe.name: Executioner's Axe
Executioner's Axe.baseEffect:
Give an allied follower Rush.
Enhance (4): Then give it +2/+2.
Executioner's Axe.baseFlair: Oh! This axe is delighted to finally taste blood!

Precious Bloodfangs.name: Precious Bloodfangs
Precious Bloodfangs.baseEffect: Summon X Forest Bats and deal X damage to your leader. X equals the number of enemy followers in play.
Precious Bloodfangs.baseFlair: When precious blood is offered, creatures of the night spawn from the shadows.

Furtive Fangs.name: Furtive Fangs
Furtive Fangs.baseEffect: Select an allied Neutral follower. Whenever that follower attacks an enemy follower, destroy the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return until the end of the turn.
Furtive Fangs.baseFlair: Grandmother used to be more scary than hairy. —Maisy, Red Riding Hood

Red Talonstrike.name: Red Talonstrike
Red Talonstrike.baseEffect: Give an allied follower +1/+0 until the end of the turn. Summon a Forest Bat if it's a Bloodcraft follower.
Red Talonstrike.baseFlair: Your blood's not worth a suck.

Kiss of Lust.name: Kiss of Lust
Kiss of Lust.baseEffect:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Restore 1 defense to both leaders.
Kiss of Lust.baseFlair: Close your eyes, and plant your seeds in the sea of compassion.

Lunatic Aether.name: Lunatic Aether
Lunatic Aether.baseEffect:
Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand.
If this is your fifth turn or later, recover 1 play point.
Then, if this is your tenth turn or later, deal 3 damage to the enemy leader and restore 3 defense to your leader.
Lunatic Aether.baseFlair:
The Mother bestows gifts upon her children.
When the nightwalker discovered her kindness in his manor, he saw a mad, ardent aether. He soon learned that it grants power to those who easily succumb to insanity.

Creeping Madness.name: Creeping Madness
Creeping Madness.baseEffect:
Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Draw a card.
If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, restore 2 defense to your leader and recover 1 play point.
Creeping Madness.baseFlair: If that vampire poses even the slightest threat to the people, the danger cannot be ignored. What bothers me is that uncanny. Power. What is... Ah. It brings. Understanding. Of madness. —Vampire hunter's scrawled journal entry

Insatiable Desire.name: Insatiable Desire
Insatiable Desire.baseEffect:
Give your leader the following effects.
-At the start of your turn, draw a card.
-At the start of your turn, lose 1 play point.
(These effects are not stackable and last for the rest of the match.)
Insatiable Desire.baseFlair:
Profit.
Profit breeds extravagance.
It is an aggregation of vanity and nonsense.
If meaningless profit is our reality, splurge it all away.

Bloodfed Flowerbed.name: Bloodfed Flowerbed
Bloodfed Flowerbed.baseEffect:
Countdown (4)
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to both leaders.
Bloodfed Flowerbed.baseFlair: The roses of the underworld are dyed with fresh blood.

Nightmare.name: Nightmare
Nightmare.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain +2/+0 if Vengeance is active for you.
Nightmare.baseFlair: You poor thing. It must be terrible to be haunted by your fears even in your dreams. I know! I can feast on those pesky dreams while you sleep!
Nightmare.evoFlair: How dreadfully delightful—consumed by the horrors of your own dreamscape. Why don't you let me devour your delicious nightmares? I won't leave anything behind, but at least you won't suffer anymore.

Sweetfang Vampire.name: Sweetfang Vampire
Sweetfang Vampire.baseFlair: What shall I have for dinner tonight? I think it's going to have to be a human. A real live human. That's the only thing that'll satisfy my hunger. Hee-hee!
Sweetfang Vampire.evoFlair: Nothing tastes better than a human! So full of light! So full of life! All the emotions like love and desire! It's all so delicious!

Lilith.name: Lilith
Lilith.baseEffect: Strike: Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
Lilith.evoEffect: Strike: Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
Lilith.baseFlair: Don't you just look like a bundle of fun. How about you and me skip right to the chase, hmm? Oh, and we don't need to go telling anybody what fun we got up to, do we now?
Lilith.evoFlair: I can think of all kinds of ways to keep myself busy with you. Now close those pretty little eyes of yours and don't... move... a muscle...

Venomous Cobra.name: Venomous Cobra
Venomous Cobra.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain Bane if Vengeance is active for you.
Venomous Cobra.baseFlair: Venomous blood gushes forth from the wounded scales. If the serpent is to be defeated, it must be done in a single blow.
Venomous Cobra.evoFlair: The serpent's blood burns through flesh, bone, and iron alike. The beast must be eradicated, else a painful death awaits.

Rain Devil.name: Rain Devil
Rain Devil.baseEffect: Fanfare: Draw a card if Vengeance is active for you.
Rain Devil.baseFlair: People are quick to curse me as a demon of rain, but we both know that rain can be a blessing.
Rain Devil.evoFlair: It's downpour after downpour. I'm starting to get the sniffles myself. Say, would you be willing to part with some of the spark in that soul of yours?

Blood Wolf.name: Blood Wolf
Blood Wolf.baseEffect:
Storm.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Blood Wolf.baseFlair: Some friendly advice. Do not make the mistake of thinking a blood wolf civil; approach one too closely and you're likely to walk away a limb or two fewer.
Blood Wolf.evoFlair: Blood wolves are implacable hunters. Once they catch the scent of their prey, they will pursue it to the ends of the earth. And until they have eaten their fill of blood and meat, nothing can stop their rampage.

Demonic Hedonist.name: Demonic Hedonist
Demonic Hedonist.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Drain if an evolved allied follower is in play.
Demonic Hedonist.baseFlair: Hey, that looks like fun. Lemme in on it!
Demonic Hedonist.evoFlair: Your lives are my toys! Who should I play with next?

Serpent Charmer.name: Serpent Charmer
Serpent Charmer.baseEffect: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Serpent Charmer.evoEffect: Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Serpent Charmer.baseFlair: Snakey's a wild one. You don't want to mess with her.
Serpent Charmer.evoFlair: Snakey's a wild one. Don't let her put the squeeze on you!

Yurius, Levin Duke.name: Yurius, Levin Duke
Yurius, Levin Duke.baseEffect: Whenever an enemy follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Yurius, Levin Duke.evoEffect: Whenever an enemy follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Yurius, Levin Duke.baseFlair: Though I'm a member of the order of the Sky Knights, I'm hardly skilled with a sword. Think of me as a scholar with a propensity for research.
Yurius, Levin Duke.evoFlair: If I complete this research, I'll gain power beyond all human knowledge. And then I'll finally be able to complete my mission. Which mission, you ask? Well, to save as many people as possible of course!

Spiderweb Imp.name: Spiderweb Imp
Spiderweb Imp.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you.
Spiderweb Imp.baseFlair: Stately strands of alabaster protect my home. Anything that gets entangled in it is my foe and my prey.
Spiderweb Imp.evoFlair: The strands of my web decide where you go. But should I suffocate you or suck you dry? The choice is mine.

Tove.name: Tove
Tove.baseEffect: When another allied Neutral follower comes into play, this follower gains Rush.
Tove.evoEffect: When another allied Neutral follower comes into play, this follower gains Rush.
Tove.baseFlair: So slithy their forms! May they waltz and gimble and gambol! May their voices sound! —Poems of Unbeing
Tove.evoFlair: Innocent as babes they pitter-patter, peculiar in shape but dearworth. —Poems of Unbeing

Scorpius.name: Scorpius
Scorpius.baseEffect:
Bane.
Strike: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Scorpius.evoEffect:
Bane.
Strike: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Scorpius.baseFlair: Hunting is the rite of receiving the blessings of the land. Respect the land and act with humility. Otherwise you will find yourself becoming the hunted. —Orion's Scorpion, Chapter 5
Scorpius.evoFlair: Even great heroes who have felled many beasts are no match for its poison. Victims suffer from paralysis, dizziness, nausea, and severe headaches. These migraines then turn into a sleep from which the victim will never awaken. —Orion's Scorpion, Chapter 8

Glassbrand Demon.name: Glassbrand Demon
Glassbrand Demon.baseEffect: Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +3/+3. Deal 2 damage to your leader if Vengeance is not active for you. Restore 2 defense to your leader if Vengeance is active for you.
Glassbrand Demon.baseFlair: Looks like you need some help! Wait, w-what do you mean, you don't need me? I guess I... I really am useless, after all!
Glassbrand Demon.evoFlair: Perhaps I can be of assistance? Allow me to help! Wait, I m-made it on time? No way... Uh, I'll do my best!

Cursed Scarecrow.name: Cursed Scarecrow
Cursed Scarecrow.baseFlair: "I'm telling y'all, it really moved! See? Here's where it bit me, right here!" — Rural Man
Cursed Scarecrow.evoFlair: "See? That's what I've been telling y'all this whole time! Now look what it's gone and done. Everything's been taken!" — Rural Man

Bewitching Succubus.name: Bewitching Succubus
Bewitching Succubus.baseFlair: "These men are too easy. Isn't there something that can entertain me?" "Perhaps we could dance, milady?" "Why would I dance with a bat?"
Bewitching Succubus.evoFlair: "What's the point? Everyone falls for me anyway. There's no fun in that." "How about a song then, milady?" "Isn't that just screeching?"

Bloodthirsty Hamster.name: Bloodthirsty Hamster
Bloodthirsty Hamster.baseEffect: Once on each of your turns, when your leader takes damage, gain +1/+0.
Bloodthirsty Hamster.baseFlair: You think it's cute, eh? Well what kind of adorable little varmint could live 'round these parts? Gotta be more to it than just squeezable cheeks. —Wasteland Explorer
Bloodthirsty Hamster.evoFlair:
Some beasties try to broadcast how dangerous they are, but, more often than not, it's just a performance. Not the case with this little guy.
—Wasteland Explorer

Servant of Lust.name: Servant of Lust
Servant of Lust.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Leader Strike: Restore 2 defense to both leaders after damage is dealt.
Servant of Lust.evoEffect: Leader Strike: Restore 2 defense to both leaders after damage is dealt.
Servant of Lust.baseFlair: Whether demonic, divine, or mundane breed, go forth and convulse en masse. It is in the confluence of our differences that we grow stronger. Cast down this odium, discrimination, and division.
Servant of Lust.evoFlair:
The First Provision: Loathe Not
Consecrate your character, your very being, to this, the greatest cause. Look upon your fellows not as abominations but as partners.
—Teachings from the Manor of Lust

Devil Raider.name: Devil Raider
Devil Raider.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4. If Vengeance is active for you, gain +5/+5 instead.
Devil Raider.baseFlair: I strayed from the path. It was no accident. Every step was intentional. With this arm, no one will ever trample me again.
Devil Raider.evoFlair: I strayed from the path. Don't misunderstand—it was long before I made my pact with a demon. The wretched girl who once drank from backstreet mud puddles is gone. In her place stands a woman with power. Now I am the one to trample others underfoot!

Liberté, Werewolf Pup.name: Liberté, Werewolf Pup
Liberté, Werewolf Pup.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +3/+3. Deal 2 damage to the enemy leader and restore 4 defense to your leader.
During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 2 defense to your leader.
Liberté, Werewolf Pup.evoEffect: During your turn, whenever another allied follower evolves, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 2 defense to your leader.
Liberté, Werewolf Pup.baseFlair: I'm a failure of a pup. My ears are bad, and I can't smell very good either. But, but I can perform! I learned how to do acrobatics and jump through a flaming ring! If I can make you smile, well, that's enough for me!
Liberté, Werewolf Pup.evoFlair: You poor, sorrowful pup. I remember when you appeared before me, evidence of my sin... I have no right to be in your life. —Lunelle, Queen of Wolves

Gearsnake Tamer.name: Gearsnake Tamer
Gearsnake Tamer.baseEffect: Whenever an allied Serpent comes into play, change it into a Machina follower.
Gearsnake Tamer.evoEffect:
Evolve: Summon 2 Serpents.
Whenever an allied Serpent comes into play, change it into a Machina follower.
Gearsnake Tamer.baseFlair: Core mutations have led to one new discovery after another. Armored Bats synthesized with machinery soon appeared... Just as those who would control such beasts did afterward. —Secrets of Sorcery Demystified I
Gearsnake Tamer.evoFlair: Bats... Whoooa... So cool... But... I'm happy... Together... With my snakes, too... After all, they're everything... to me. —Gearsnake Tamer to Armored Bat

Swarming Wraith.name: Swarming Wraith
Swarming Wraith.baseEffect: Fanfare: If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 2 damage to your leader. If Vengeance is active for you, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Swarming Wraith.baseFlair: Abnormal figures take form in the shadows. They mimic the living, taking form through negative emotion. Even now, they lay hidden within the gaps.
Swarming Wraith.evoFlair: Some evils simply cannot die. As the demons we carry within ourselves take form once more, malice and despair writhe and wriggle into existence.

Leraje.name: Leraje
Leraje.baseFlair: Use my arrows to necrotize your enemies' bodies and bring them under my control? Understood. About your plan though. I think there's room for optimization. I'm willing to offer you a one-time-only discount. Just take a look at this updated contract...
Leraje.evoFlair: So you want me to use my magic to sow discord in the enemy camp? Understood. If you'll just sign here—that's right, in blood—we can get this contract squared away. Great. Now if you're ready, I'd like to take you through a few alternate plans...

Corrupted Bat.name: Corrupted Bat
Corrupted Bat.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a Naterran Great Tree into your hand. If Vengeance is active for you, gain +1/+0 and Ward.
Corrupted Bat.baseFlair:
I've never seen that species before. Its wings generate some sort of light. What could that be? I have to... follow. It. This is. A great. Discovery. But. Those wings. I feel like. They are. Madness. Given form...
—Scholar's scrawled journal entry
Corrupted Bat.evoFlair:
Strange. Strange. Strange. Strange. Strange, strange bat. How odd. Why? Does my head. Feel so... strange? Wings? Strange? The madness. Won't stop.
—Twisted scrawl

Rookie Succubus.name: Rookie Succubus
Rookie Succubus.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Summon a Forest Bat.
Rookie Succubus.baseFlair: The manual says no great succubus's career was built in a day. So you gotta listen to your elders and put in the elbow grease! Mmmwah! How was that, Mr. Bat? Charming enough for ya?
Rookie Succubus.evoFlair: Look at all those demons coming this way... Did my hard work finally pay off? I'm improving! Wait... they're all here to meet her, aren't they? I knew it...

Antelope Pelt Warrior.name: Antelope Pelt Warrior
Antelope Pelt Warrior.baseEffect: Fanfare: If Wrath is not active for you, gain the following effect - At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and this follower. Otherwise, gain the following effect - At the end of your turn, restore 3 defense to your leader.
Antelope Pelt Warrior.baseFlair: The horned beast's meat is tough. Its flavor unfolds as you chew. You must kill it the same way. Blow after blow after blow, until it falls. —Second Berserker's Epitaph: Part 1
Antelope Pelt Warrior.evoFlair: I took my first pelt. My history is written on its skin. I will gain the beast's resilience. I will don the pelt and test my strength. —Second Berserker's Epitaph: Part 2

Vampiric Bloodbinder.name: Vampiric Bloodbinder
Vampiric Bloodbinder.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, draw a card.
Vampiric Bloodbinder.evoEffect: Last Words: At the start of your next turn, draw a card.
Vampiric Bloodbinder.baseFlair: You're looking for a contract... with me? Oh darling, do you know what you're getting yourself into? It'll sting. And you understand everything comes with a price tag, don't you? Hm? I'm too straitlaced to be a vampire, you say? Hah. You really think so?
Vampiric Bloodbinder.evoFlair: Look, honey—I despise lies. I've been that way since I was mortal. Anyway, we are talking binding contracts here. These things are much nicer when both parties are interested. Now, be a dear and give me some blood. But... do tell me if it hurts.

Moonrise Werewolf.name: Moonrise Werewolf
Moonrise Werewolf.baseEffect:
Fanfare: If Avarice is active for you, gain +0/+2 and Ward.
Fanfare: Enhance (5) - Gain +3/+3.
Moonrise Werewolf.baseFlair: I'm The Moon, howler of apprehension. I stand ready to defend the frightened. I'm still learning as a pup, but I eat cowardice for breakfast.
Moonrise Werewolf.evoFlair: With a little practice, I can crush any fears. I might be young, but I'm not afraid to howl in the moonlight. We're picky about our masters—but if you're worthy, werewolves become the perfect bodyguards.

Mormo.name: Mormo
Mormo.baseEffect: Fanfare: Summon 2 Forest Bats if Vengeance is active for you.
Mormo.baseFlair: What's that? Are you lost, little human? Hee-hee! Well you're in luck, because I love humans! You smell so good, and you really do have the sweetest blood.
Mormo.evoFlair: Mmm... Your blood's delicious! And oh-so very addictive. I wish I could become your familiar and follow you everywhere you go. Hee-hee!

Dark Summoner.name: Dark Summoner
Dark Summoner.evoEffect: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to your leader.
Dark Summoner.baseFlair: Want to know how I came to master the forbidden arts? Well, it all started with a demon...
Dark Summoner.evoFlair: Did you like that? Hee-hee. What's not to love about forbidden magic? The energy surges through you like an intense wave of raw power! What's that? I look different all of sudden?

Baphomet.name: Baphomet
Baphomet.baseEffect: Fanfare: Put a random Bloodcraft follower from your deck into your hand.
Baphomet.baseFlair: The goat-headed, sturdy-bodied demon warrior was also a devout priest who prayed to a dark god to summon countless demons.
Baphomet.evoFlair: The demon warrior itself was mighty indeed. Armed with a trident that also served as a staff, it could wreathe a kingdom in flames and reduce it to ash with a single swing.

Boy Who Cried Wolf.name: Boy Who Cried Wolf
Boy Who Cried Wolf.baseEffect: Can't be attacked by followers with 1 attack.
Boy Who Cried Wolf.evoEffect: Can't be attacked by followers with 1 attack.
Boy Who Cried Wolf.baseFlair: There was once a born liar who cried, "Wolf! Wolf!" When the townsfolk fled in fear, he burglarized their town. —Where the Liars Go, Chapter 1
Boy Who Cried Wolf.evoFlair: The boy was laughing in joy when hoofbeats began to sound. Mounted wolf-slayers had arrived, and they struck the boy down where he stood. —Where the Liars Go, final chapter

Demonic Ram.name: Demonic Ram
Demonic Ram.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever your leader takes damage during your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
Demonic Ram.baseFlair:
It may creep in while you count sheep.
It needs no grass—your heart's its meat.
—Demon's lullaby
Demonic Ram.evoFlair:
Nights becomes moons, and your heart now wanes.
At the nightmare's end, a husk alone remains.
—Demon's lullaby

Silverchain Disciple.name: Silverchain Disciple
Silverchain Disciple.baseEffect: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, deal 1 damage to both leaders and then 2 damage to a random enemy follower.
Silverchain Disciple.baseFlair: Vampire! Tainted one! My silver chains will reveal your immortality as false. Howl, my platinum chains.
Silverchain Disciple.evoFlair: They wind, and snarl, and purify. Before these goddess-blessed chains, you are nothing more than prey to be hunted.

Alexandrite Demon.name: Alexandrite Demon
Alexandrite Demon.baseEffect: Fanfare: Choose - Put a Blazing Sapphire or Blazing Ruby into your hand.
Alexandrite Demon.baseFlair: Join your heart with the crystals. That's right, now align them together... A path of azure and path of crimson await you. Which one calls to your heart?
Alexandrite Demon.evoFlair: The crystal is merely a mirror, reflecting the colors of your heart. When it shines, your fate shall be revealed. Will you be dyed in azure or colored in red? Which will your heart choose?

Hellblaze Demon.name: Hellblaze Demon
Hellblaze Demon.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Give +X/+0 to a Bloodcraft follower in your hand. X equals the number of other allied followers in play.
Hellblaze Demon.baseFlair: Sky full of clouds, air bitter and cold, and this stupid, white snow! Makes you shiver, doesn't it? That's why winter is the worst. But it's okay now! I'll keep you warm with my scorching blaze.
Hellblaze Demon.evoFlair: Sky full of clouds, air bitter and cold, breath white with frost. Numbs you to the bone, doesn't it? That's why winter is so awful. But it's okay now! I'll thaw you out, and burn away all your frozen bits!

Nightmare, Dreameater.name: Nightmare, Dreameater
Nightmare, Dreameater.baseEffect:
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain +2/+0.
Last Words: Summon a Forest Bat and give it +X/+0. X equals this follower's attack before being destroyed.
Nightmare, Dreameater.evoEffect: Last Words: Summon a Forest Bat and give it +X/+0. X equals this follower's attack before being destroyed.
Nightmare, Dreameater.baseFlair: Good thing you didn't come across a real vampire, nasty creatures they are. You'd be devoured—body and soul. Lucky for you, I'm the generous type. I'll even show you a dream of divine... pleasure.
Nightmare, Dreameater.evoFlair:
"If I studied super hard in a dream, I might even be able to pass!"
—Lou, Mysterian Freshman
"I mean, I'll just devour it in the end..."
—Nightmare, Dreameater

Boar Pelt Warrior.name: Boar Pelt Warrior
Boar Pelt Warrior.baseEffect: Fanfare: If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 1 damage to your leader. Then activate Vengeance until the end of the turn even if your leader's defense is more than 10.
Boar Pelt Warrior.baseFlair: The tusked beast's flesh reeks. It must be rubbed with herbs, then boiled repeatedly. The flavor remaining in the stench's wake stabs at the nose and stomach. —Fourth Berserker's Epitaph: Part 1
Boar Pelt Warrior.evoFlair: With the speed of the long-clawed beast, we confounded and defeated the tusked beast. From the tusked beast, we gained piercing strength. With this, we can take a far thicker pelt... —Fourth Berserker's Epitaph: Part 2

Hellspear Warrior.name: Hellspear Warrior
Hellspear Warrior.baseEffect: Fanfare: If Avarice is active for you, gain Storm.
Hellspear Warrior.baseFlair: In his arm resides demon magic. But in his fist rests a spear stained by demon blood. Though his flesh is corrupted by devilish influence, his will is to drive the devils' influence from this world.
Hellspear Warrior.evoFlair: The path of vengeance is treacherous and lonely—no more than a life spent hunted by demons and shunned by humans. His arm is tainted; his soul is weary. Still he does not let go of his exalted spear, which, in the moonlight, gleams like new-fallen snow.

Whiplash Imp.name: Whiplash Imp
Whiplash Imp.baseEffect:
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, gain +1/+4, Rush, and Drain.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Summon an Imp Lancer.
Whiplash Imp.baseFlair: It's long, it's fast, and it'll make you cry! Ta-da! Can I make a mean whip or what? Now that I have this baby, no one can accuse me of being just another ho-hum imp!
Whiplash Imp.evoFlair: Eeek! Moooom! I told you to knock before coming into my room! And would you stop laughing at my outfit? I'm just trying to find myself as an imp, okay?

Vania, Vampire Princess.name: Vania, Vampire Princess
Vania, Vampire Princess.baseEffect: Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Vania, Vampire Princess.evoEffect:
Evolve: Summon a Forest Bat.
Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Vania, Vampire Princess.baseFlair: Hey! It's not nice to mess with my bloodkin!
Vania, Vampire Princess.evoFlair: I'm here now, so everything will be okay! 'Cause I'm the best there is!

Galretto, Devil of Love.name: Galretto, Devil of Love
Galretto, Devil of Love.baseEffect: If this follower can be targeted by enemy spells or effects, your opponent can only target this follower.
Galretto, Devil of Love.evoEffect: If this follower can be targeted by enemy spells or effects, your opponent can only target this follower.
Galretto, Devil of Love.baseFlair: I'll keep you smiling. Both destiny and I can be fickle now and then, you see.
Galretto, Devil of Love.evoFlair: I fear that the bond we share won't last forever, but all good things must come to an end.

Raven, Eventide Vampire.name: Raven, Eventide Vampire
Raven, Eventide Vampire.baseEffect:
If you have at least 2 play points, and Vengeance is active for you, Choose: Play this card as a Raven, Noontide Vampire or Raven, Midnight Vampire.
----------
Fanfare: Summon a Forest Bat.
Raven, Eventide Vampire.baseFlair: I'll stay with you all night long. If you so desire, I'll paint myself in your very color.
Raven, Eventide Vampire.evoFlair: I'll stay with you all night long. If you so desire, I'll paint the night in your very color.

Vuella, One-Winged Demon.name: Vuella, One-Winged Demon
Vuella, One-Winged Demon.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to a Bloodcraft follower in your hand.
Vuella, One-Winged Demon.evoEffect: Evolve: Give +1/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your hand.
Vuella, One-Winged Demon.baseFlair: I'm no longer the proud demon I once was... A pitiful sight to behold, don't you think? If you'll have me though... I'll stand by your side, until this last wing is no more!
Vuella, One-Winged Demon.evoFlair: Broken. Imperfect. Surely not worthy of your glance. But if you're willing to take a chance on me, I'll muster my courage and give you everything I have!

Lykos Berserker.name: Lykos Berserker
Lykos Berserker.baseEffect: Last Words: If this follower's attack was at least 4 before being destroyed, put a Blood Moon into your hand and change its cost to 1.
Lykos Berserker.baseFlair: Your men are but a pack of pups under the moonlight. —Waltz, King of Wolves
Lykos Berserker.evoFlair: Your transgressions and your brutality... they will not go unanswered by the moon. —The New Queen

Doublame, Duke and Dame.name: Doublame, Duke and Dame
Doublame, Duke and Dame.baseEffect: Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, Choose - Put a Peckish Owlcat or Leoparion into your hand.
Doublame, Duke and Dame.evoEffect: Evolve: Choose - Put a Peckish Owlcat or Leoparion into your hand.
Doublame, Duke and Dame.baseFlair:
"They're disgusting... This one, that one, all of them!"
"Hah! You guys've got guts to oppose us!"
"Yep. You're all going to meet a real ugly end."
"Here it comes! Twinsoul Fusion!"
Doublame, Duke and Dame.evoFlair:
"Grrr... Why do all of these creeps keep getting in our way!?"
"Even though we fused them... They're still so disgusting!"
"Ungrateful louts. We'll scramble you!"
"You said it! Twin! Soul! Fusion!"

Io, Enchanting Educator.name: Io, Enchanting Educator
Io, Enchanting Educator.baseEffect:
Drain.
Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Select 2 enemy followers. Deal X damage to the first follower and Y damage to the second follower. X equals the attack of the second follower and Y equals the attack of the first follower.
Io, Enchanting Educator.evoEffect:
Drain.
Evolve: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
Io, Enchanting Educator.baseFlair: I'm actually pretty new to teaching. My subject is language studies, but I also know a lot about romance novels and girls' comics. Anything you need to know, just ask.
Io, Enchanting Educator.evoFlair: What's the subject you struggle with most? I'll clear my schedule this weekend and give you a private tutoring session. One-on-one is the best way to learn, don't you think? That way I can give you all my attention.

Contemptous Demon.name: Contemptous Demon
Contemptous Demon.baseEffect:
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader.
At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
Contemptous Demon.evoEffect:
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader.
At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader.
During your turn, whenever your leader takes damage, deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower (up to 10 times per turn).
Contemptous Demon.baseFlair: Aaah, that bleating is music to my ears. Look, I'm not here to kill you. Buuut, I'm not letting you live either. I'll break you down, fix you up, then make you love me. Love me with all your heart.
Contemptous Demon.evoFlair: I'm rather fond of humans. Fragile, but resolute. Weak, but determined. But sometimes I get a tad too excited and accidents happen... See? Now you're crying. I don't see what good it'll do you though.

Raven, Noontide Vampire.name: Raven, Noontide Vampire
Raven, Noontide Vampire.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Summon a Forest Bat.
Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Raven, Noontide Vampire.evoEffect: Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Raven, Noontide Vampire.baseFlair: I only wish to stay with you all day, master. Just as you desired,I...
Raven, Noontide Vampire.evoFlair: I only wish to stay with you all day, master. If you so desire, I'll relinquish the day to you.

Raven, Midnight Vampire.name: Raven, Midnight Vampire
Raven, Midnight Vampire.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Summon a Forest Bat.
Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Raven, Midnight Vampire.evoEffect: Whenever an allied Forest Bat comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Raven, Midnight Vampire.baseFlair: I decided to stay with you all night! I did just what you said!
Raven, Midnight Vampire.evoFlair: I decided to stay with you all night! If you insist... then I'll stay with you till the morning!

Aza & Iza, Feline Maids.name: Aza & Iza, Feline Maids
Aza & Iza, Feline Maids.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Evolve an allied Trill, Devilish Idol.
Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Aza & Iza, Feline Maids.evoEffect: Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Aza & Iza, Feline Maids.baseFlair:
In the shadows behind the glittering idol Trill, you will always find the two maids, Aza and Iza.
"That girl is so two-faced she's practically two different people."
"Yeah, but... she's actually pretty nice."
Aza & Iza, Feline Maids.evoFlair:
The maids serve both as Trill's honor guard and her band. They would do anything for their mistress... At least, as long as she pays their wages and keeps them in fish.
"Mm... this is good salmon."
"Trill always sets such a good table!"

Peckish Owlcat.name: Peckish Owlcat
Peckish Owlcat.baseEffect:
Ward.
Fanfare: Destroy an enemy follower with 1 attack or 1 defense.
Peckish Owlcat.baseFlair:
"Oppose us and you deal with our pet!"
"An owl and cat both, taste the power of two night stalkers made one!"
"Twin! Soul! Fusion!"
—Doublame, Duke and Dame
Peckish Owlcat.evoFlair: It is both owl and cat, two beasts that were... intended to form an apex predator. But it eats rats, which is a good enough compromise. Born from a beast of the land and a bird of the sky, its hunger is now twofold. Please feed it.

Leoparion.name: Leoparion
Leoparion.baseFlair:
"Oppose us and you deal with our pet!"
"A leopard and lion both, taste the power of two forest kings made one!"
"Twin! Soul! Fusion!"
—Doublame, Duke and Dame
Leoparion.evoFlair: It is both leopard and lion, two beasts melded together to form an apex predator. Though they may have taken a new singular form, their desire to hunt remains intact. But now they move with two minds, capable of tearing through throats at twice the pace.

Vira, Knight Fanatic.name: Vira, Knight Fanatic
Vira, Knight Fanatic.evoEffect: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect until the start of your next turn - Reduce damage to your leader to 0. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.) Give this follower the following effect until the start of your next turn: Subtract 2 from damage taken by this follower.
Vira, Knight Fanatic.baseFlair:
Ahh... Katalina...
You're always so beautiful no matter the occasion... Everything I am, it's all for you...
Vira, Knight Fanatic.evoFlair: Katalina, everything I do is for you... Of course I'll gladly display my power if you wish. Come forth, Luminiera.

Mono, Garnet Rebel.name: Mono, Garnet Rebel
Mono, Garnet Rebel.baseEffect:
Fanfare: If at least 7 allied Machina followers have been destroyed this match, put an Alpha Drive into your hand.
Can't be evolved using evolution points. (Can be evolved using card effects.)
Mono, Garnet Rebel.evoEffect:
Storm.
Ward.
At the beginning of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and this follower.
Mono, Garnet Rebel.baseFlair: There is merit in fighting for our sentience—I suppose I say that precisely because I am a being of thoughts and emotions—but there's nothing mysterious about a soul crying for its freedom. Even if it's incased in a metal shell.
Mono, Garnet Rebel.evoFlair: It's not so bad, this thinking business. It allows me to laugh and enjoy simple pleasures, like chitchats—yes, the experience of joy is a joy to experience! But then again... I wouldn't feel things like sadness if I had remained unawakened.

Voice of the Abyss.name: Voice of the Abyss
Voice of the Abyss.baseEffect:
Ambush.
Strike: Gain +1/+0 until the end of the turn.
Voice of the Abyss.baseFlair: Before you lay the opening from where no light may enter. Now touch it. Revere it. A darkness in the lowest of depths from which no voice may leave. —The Abyss, Chapter 1, Verse 5
Voice of the Abyss.evoFlair: You awaken to a deafening roar. Gasping for air and shivering with fear, you shall witness the truth. For beyond... your punishment awaits. With trembling arms and eyes bewildered, feel it for yourself— ah, yes... the warmth of despair. —The Abyss, Chapter 4, Verse 2

Blood Pact.name: Blood Pact
Blood Pact.baseEffect:
Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Draw 2 cards.

Razory Claw.name: Razory Claw
Razory Claw.baseEffect: Deal 2 damage to your leader and 3 damage to an enemy.
Razory Claw.baseFlair: Just remember, you've made me do this. Not even I could stop me now!

Limil's Way.name: Limil's Way
Limil's Way.baseEffect: Give Drain to an allied follower.

Summon Bloodkin.name: Summon Bloodkin
Summon Bloodkin.baseFlair: At the master's command, the two darknesses begin to dance.

Vampiric Kiss.name: Vampiric Kiss
Vampiric Kiss.baseEffect:
Deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Vampiric Kiss.baseFlair: What promise does the vampire's kiss hold? Oblivion or immortality?

Entrancing Blow.name: Entrancing Blow
Entrancing Blow.baseEffect:
Give +2/+0 to a Bloodcraft follower in your hand.
Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower.
(Can be played only when a targetable card is in your hand.)
Entrancing Blow.baseFlair: When bewitched by a succubus, your fate may vary: some lose consciousness, some lose their hearts, some lose their lives.

Deal with the Devil.name: Deal with the Devil
Deal with the Devil.baseEffect:
Deal 5 damage to a random allied follower and a random enemy follower.
Both players draw a card.
Deal with the Devil.baseFlair:
Third-rate con artists offer deals which benefit only themselves.
Second-rate merchants offer fifty-fifty trades.
A first-class devil's proposal benefits only the other party.

Dark Summons.name: Dark Summons
Dark Summons.baseEffect:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
If Wrath is active for you, recover 2 play points.
Dark Summons.baseFlair: Darkness skips pleasantries and simply awakens one's appetite.

Medusa's Gaze.name: Medusa's Gaze
Medusa's Gaze.baseEffect: Give an allied follower the following effect until the end of the turn: Follower Strike - Destroy the enemy follower before it can deal any damage in return.
Medusa's Gaze.baseFlair: Your tears can't save you. Turn to stone!

Hungering Horde.name: Hungering Horde
Hungering Horde.baseEffect: Select an enemy follower. Deal 3 damage to it and all enemy followers of the same name.
Hungering Horde.baseFlair: "Give me an arm!" "Give me a leg!" "Give me the torso!" "Give me the lips!" "The... lips?" —Group of ghouls

Snarling Chains.name: Snarling Chains
Snarling Chains.baseEffect:
Deal 1 damage to both leaders.
Then deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Snarling Chains.baseFlair: We are bound to heaven's plan, and our lives are fated. If you would scoff and condescend, then I shall bind you and grant you your fate.

Wings of Lust.name: Wings of Lust
Wings of Lust.baseEffect:
Give +2/+2 to an allied follower. That follower gains the following effect: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and this follower.
Enhance (4): Give Drain to that follower.
Wings of Lust.baseFlair: Love and mix, ravish and enrapture. Let lust overtake you as you come together with your fellows.

Wicked Pact.name: Wicked Pact
Wicked Pact.baseEffect:
Destroy an enemy follower.
If Vengeance is not active for you, deal X damage to your leader. X equals the destroyed follower's attack. Otherwise, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Wicked Pact.baseFlair: As his vision goes red, he realizes his folly. He asked the devil for strength; he did not ask for life.

Garnet Waltz.name: Garnet Waltz
Garnet Waltz.baseEffect:
Choose: Use play points equal to this card's cost and play this card as a Urias's Revelry or Mono's Resolve.
If Vengeance is active for you, instead deal 3 damage to the enemy leader and recover 1 evolution point.
Garnet Waltz.baseFlair: The world of machines falls to ruin. The cogs that built the nation begin to leak tears. A bemused tongue speaks. "Now show me. Prove that you have a will; prove that you have a soul."

Crimson Burst.name: Crimson Burst
Crimson Burst.baseEffect:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy.
Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Crimson Burst.baseFlair: A richer rouge for a ruby red rose.

Berserker's Pelt.name: Berserker's Pelt
Berserker's Pelt.baseEffect:
Countdown (3)
At the start of your opponent's turn, give Bane to a random allied Bloodcraft follower. Then, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, give it +1/+1.
Berserker's Pelt.baseFlair:
We lived by hunting beasts and eating their flesh. Once we knew the power of their pelts, we hunters became warriors.
—First Berserker's Epitaph

Mask of the Black Death.name: Mask of the Black Death
Mask of the Black Death.baseEffect:
Countdown (5)
Whenever your leader takes damage, reduce the damage to 0 and subtract the same amount from this amulet's Countdown instead. (If there is more than 1 allied Mask of the Black Death in play, subtract this amount from the Countdown of each.)
Mask of the Black Death.baseFlair: Like any other contagion, death can be prevented.

Night Fall.name: Night Fall
Night Fall.baseEffect:
Countdown (2)
At the end of your opponent's turn, summon a Forest Bat.
Night Fall.baseFlair: It lurks under the shadow of night—the embodiment of darkness, perhaps the manifestation of night itself. Watch your step, for the night is unforgiving.

Madness Revealed.name: Madness Revealed
Madness Revealed.baseEffect:
Countdown (1)
Fanfare: Deal 4 damage to your leader.
Last Words: Restore 8 defense to your leader.
Madness Revealed.baseFlair: It lurks under the shadow of night—an invisible presence as shapeless as the dark, perhaps the manifestation of night itself. Make the wrong move, and the night shall punish.

Blazing Sapphire.name: Blazing Sapphire
Blazing Sapphire.baseEffect:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
Last Words: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Blazing Sapphire.baseFlair: The way of blue is the way of riches. Be wary not to sit in the lap of luxury for too long. —Alexandrite Demon

Vampiric Fortress.name: Vampiric Fortress
Vampiric Fortress.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, summon a Forest Bat if an allied Forest Bat is in play. Then if there were 4 cards in your area when the turn ended, destroy this amulet and deal X damage to the enemy leader. X equals the number of allied Forest Bats in play.
Vampiric Fortress.baseFlair: An ancient fortress of the darkest black surrounded by countless creatures of the night. Occasionally, screams can be heard through the din of flapping wings.

Crazed Executioner.name: Crazed Executioner
Crazed Executioner.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Crazed Executioner.baseFlair: More, I tell you! More! Heads will roll until my axe turns blunt, and then I'll chop some more!
Crazed Executioner.evoFlair: You're out of people to execute? You filthy liar! All humans will answer for the crime of existing, and I will be their judge, jury, and executioner!

Metal Gargoyle.name: Metal Gargoyle
Metal Gargoyle.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain +1/+0 and Ward if Vengeance is active for you.
Metal Gargoyle.baseFlair: If you ever find yourself exploring a dungeon, beware of metal statues. They're ice-hearted guardians who will show you no mercy.
Metal Gargoyle.evoFlair: Their glazed look has fooled many a dungeon raider into dismissing them as harmless. Never ever turn your back on one.

Killer Devil.name: Killer Devil
Killer Devil.baseFlair: Roll up, roll up! Get ya front-row seat to the slaughterhouse show of a lifetime, hosted by this pint-sized imp 'erself! Mind ya, don't lean in too close, though. Lethal accidents do happen on occasion! Hee-hee.
Killer Devil.evoFlair: What better night for a slaughter than one lit by a blood-drenched full moon! I promise you'll love it to death. 'Ang on a minute. Didn't I just kill you? Hey, get back 'ere!

Demonhand Assassin.name: Demonhand Assassin
Demonhand Assassin.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain Drain if Vengeance is active for you.
Demonhand Assassin.baseFlair: My demon claw yearns for blood, so I'll have to take your life. It's nothing personal.
Demonhand Assassin.evoFlair: Do you see? It throbs with hunger! Please, let it sink into your desperate face! Let it steep its fingers in the warmth of your lifeblood.

Demonic Sniper.name: Demonic Sniper
Demonic Sniper.baseFlair: Yes, yes! More! Oh, is that all you have? But I was so enjoying myself. If that's all the fun you can offer, I'll just have to kill you.
Demonic Sniper.evoFlair: That's more like it! I think it's time to kick this up a notch, don't you agree? Don't go dying too quickly, you hear? Ah-ha-ha!

Succubus.name: Succubus
Succubus.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader if their defense is higher than yours.
Succubus.evoEffect: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader if their defense is higher than yours.
Succubus.baseFlair: It's no use trying to hide it. I can see it all over your face—you're dreaming of us together in paradise. Tee-hee. I do like the shy ones.
Succubus.evoFlair: Hmm, you are a shy one. Don't worry, I won't bite—much. Tee-hee, we'll do things you only dreamed of. And some you didn't.

Mini Soul Devil.name: Mini Soul Devil
Mini Soul Devil.baseEffect: Whenever another follower evolves, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 1 defense to your leader.
Mini Soul Devil.evoEffect: Whenever another follower evolves, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 1 defense to your leader.
Mini Soul Devil.baseFlair: They're all bright and pretty like people souls...
Mini Soul Devil.evoFlair: Now I'm strong and sparkly too. Hurray...

Alpha Wolfman.name: Alpha Wolfman
Alpha Wolfman.baseEffect:
Bane.
Fanfare: Summon an Alpha Wolfman if Vengeance is active for you.
Alpha Wolfman.baseFlair: The woods around here belong to wolfmen. If you see bite marks or scratches on the trees, turn back. There's no reasoning with a beast once you're inside its territory.
Alpha Wolfman.evoFlair: Wolfmen can use their impressive claws to take down monsters many times larger than themselves. If you ever come across monster carcasses with their throats ripped out, that's the work of wolfmen.

Frogbat.name: Frogbat
Frogbat.baseEffect: At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0.
Frogbat.evoEffect: At the end of your turn, gain +1/+0.
Frogbat.baseFlair: I wanted to fly from the time I was a tadpole, and the gods eventually gave me these wings. I'm happy about that, but I lost the most beloved thing in my life. I no longer have a purpose or reason to live. What am I supposed to do now?
Frogbat.evoFlair: Eureka! At last! An answer! I don't need a purpose or reason to live, because I'm as free as the sky itself. There's nothing I can't do.

Disagreeable Demon.name: Disagreeable Demon
Disagreeable Demon.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain Ward if an enemy follower is in play. Gain +2/+0 and deal 2 damage to your leader if no enemy followers are in play.
Disagreeable Demon.baseFlair: Humph! It's not like I care about you!
Disagreeable Demon.evoFlair: Humph! Don't—don't get any ideas! I'm not going to help you fight your stupid enemies!

Fanged Serpent.name: Fanged Serpent
Fanged Serpent.baseEffect:
Ward.
Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Fanged Serpent.evoEffect:
Ward.
Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Fanged Serpent.baseFlair: We've got a rule on this mountain, one that might contradict what you know: don't fight against the bite. —Prospector's teachings
Fanged Serpent.evoFlair: If you run into that thing, you better start praying. But none of that "save me" crap. No, you'll wanna pray that it kills you quickly in a single bite. —Prospector's teachings

Savage Wolf.name: Savage Wolf
Savage Wolf.baseFlair: If you were able to tame a magical wolf, it would bite the hands of your foes; there's no better friend to have on the battlefield. —"Wolves," The Monster Encyclopedia, Chapter 4
Savage Wolf.evoFlair: If you know what they want and are able to provide it for them, magical wolves can be fiercely loyal hunters for their partners. —"Wolves," The Monster Encyclopedia, Chapter 5

Nightmare Devil.name: Nightmare Devil
Nightmare Devil.baseEffect: Fanfare and Last Words: Summon a Forest Bat.
Nightmare Devil.evoEffect: Last Words: Summon a Forest Bat.
Nightmare Devil.baseFlair: She'll guide you to a dream, a wonderful dream from which you'll never wake up.
Nightmare Devil.evoFlair: None can escape from the dream. None can run from it. Now let me color you something altogether new.

Zehek, the Cursebranded.name: Zehek, the Cursebranded
Zehek, the Cursebranded.evoEffect: Evolve: Deal 1 damage to an enemy follower if Vengeance is not active for you. Deal 1 damage to all enemies if Vengeance is active for you.
Zehek, the Cursebranded.baseFlair: An ancient curse afflicts me... It causes magic to pour ceaselessly from my body. Monsters are attracted to this residual power—that's why I can't risk traveling with others.
Zehek, the Cursebranded.evoFlair:
Guh... Gaargh!
The power's running wild... I can't control it! If you don't want to get caught in the blast, get away from me! Now!

Furfur.name: Furfur
Furfur.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give +2/+0 to a Bloodcraft follower in your hand.
Furfur.baseFlair:
A deceitful stag demon, wreathed in smoke wherever it goes. If you would hear the truth from its lips, you must bind it within a magic triangle.
—Chapter 1, Evil Beasts and How to Bind Them
Furfur.evoFlair:
A deceitful stag demon wreathed in flame. Bringer of tempests. Its rasping voice imparts the world's deepest mysteries.
—Chapter 2, Evil Beasts and How to Bind Them

Armored Bat.name: Armored Bat
Armored Bat.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +4/+4 and Ward.
Last Words: Summon 2 Assembly Droids.
Armored Bat.baseFlair: The source of the core's metamorphosis was a diminutive nightkin. Its body—well, frame—is as cute as it is curious. But I see that its new form has retained its mischievous love of biting. —Vampire Hunter's Notes, Part 1
Armored Bat.evoFlair: I daresay, I witnessed the most inexplicable phenomenon last night: a colony of bats donning steel. Was this a mere trick of my mortal brethren? Or have I glimpsed into the future of their species? —Vampire's Account, Part 1

Nefilio, Dour Demon.name: Nefilio, Dour Demon
Nefilio, Dour Demon.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Gain +4/+4.
Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Nefilio, Dour Demon.evoEffect: Can't be targeted by enemy spells and effects.
Nefilio, Dour Demon.baseFlair:
The wordwielder who eradicated love. The demon who returned to her side. The reason he left the town was to find the strength to resist the curse. With the power of truth, he showed her the meaning of love.
—Ville de l'Amour, Reunited
Nefilio, Dour Demon.evoFlair:
"There are no falsehoods in my words: I love you."
"I...I l-love you too."
This is Ville de l'Amour. A town brimming with the miracle known as love.
—Ville de l'Amour, A Union

Ogre Champion.name: Ogre Champion
Ogre Champion.baseEffect:
Fanfare: If Avarice is active for you, deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Fanfare: Enhance (6) - Gain +3/+3.
Ogre Champion.baseFlair:
Dearest Mama,
It seems like as soon as we arrive on the scene, my senior officer's face contorts into the most fearsome expressions. He says he's simply motivated, but he frightens me more than the enemy. —Letter from a hellish battlefield
Ogre Champion.evoFlair:
Dearest Mama,
My senior officer said that what was motivating him was the desire to bring everyone back alive. Thanks to him, we're all on our way home.
—Letter from a joyfully victorious city

Devil of Vengeance.name: Devil of Vengeance
Devil of Vengeance.baseEffect: Can only attack if Vengeance is active for you.
Devil of Vengeance.evoEffect: Can only attack if Vengeance is active for you.
Devil of Vengeance.baseFlair: Loyalty... Justice... I used to believe in such things, but I was a naive fool. Such lofty concepts are nothing but a hindrance on the battlefield.
Devil of Vengeance.evoFlair: See? I once pledged undying loyalty to my king, yet now I have the strength to fell him with one blow! Ha-ha-ha-ha!

Midnight Vampire.name: Midnight Vampire
Midnight Vampire.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give +1/+0 to allied Forest Bats.
Midnight Vampire.baseFlair: I'm sooo tired of being stuck inside! And what's wrong with having a little fun on a night like this when the moon's so beautiful? Come on, my little friend, you can join in as well!
Midnight Vampire.evoFlair: Oh no, the sun's come out! Looks like the fun's over then. Come on, let's get back to the mansion. You'll escort me, right, my little friend?

Vampire Lykos.name: Vampire Lykos
Vampire Lykos.evoEffect: Evolve: Deal 3 damage to both leaders.
Vampire Lykos.baseFlair: Hrrr! I'm not like you dumb humans, you know. Not with this new power. I'm strong now. Stronger than vampires! Stronger than a lykos!
Vampire Lykos.evoFlair: Hrrr... Wh-what? My mind! I-it's melting... melting away... My mind is blank... and it feels good! Hrrr, hrrr! It feels goood!

Masked Butcher.name: Masked Butcher
Masked Butcher.baseEffect: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers if Vengeance is active for you.
Masked Butcher.baseFlair: I am the unknown assassin. I serve the Vampire Lord, striking soundlessly from the shadowing and claiming the lives of hapless humans.
Masked Butcher.evoFlair: A slash of my claws and a life is claimed. And then another. So long as the Vampire Lord wills it, the masked assassin shall continue to hunt.

Veight, Vampire Noble.name: Veight, Vampire Noble
Veight, Vampire Noble.baseEffect:
Ward.
Clash: Summon a Forest Bat.
Veight, Vampire Noble.evoEffect:
Ward.
Clash: Summon a Forest Bat.
Veight, Vampire Noble.baseFlair: I have been sent to greet you in place of our sleeping empress. When you meet her, you better show enough respect to make her feel like you're kissing her feet.
Veight, Vampire Noble.evoFlair: You humans are our food. The only reason I haven't consumed you is as a favor to the queen. But you know, I think I could use a little snack. Don't worry! I'll make sure it doesn't hurt... much.

Vassago.name: Vassago
Vassago.evoEffect: Evolve: Destroy an allied follower, then summon a copy of that follower and give it Rush.
Vassago.baseFlair: Oh, you're a new face. I'll pierce you right there—it will only hurt for an instant... but you'll be begging for more when I'm done with you.
Vassago.evoFlair: I'll give you some love. It will only hurt for a second, but the pleasure will be worth your while—I promise.

Pazuzu.name: Pazuzu
Pazuzu.baseEffect:
Bane.
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers if Vengeance is active for you.
Pazuzu.baseFlair: This amalgamation of beasts tears into flesh of its prey with the fangs of a lion—only after it has succumbed to the toxins of the scorpion tail, of course.
Pazuzu.evoFlair: It's easy to forget about the serpent, but one should never ignore it—the venomous clouds expelled from its fangs are fatal.

Frenzied Werewolf.name: Frenzied Werewolf
Frenzied Werewolf.baseEffect:
Rush.
Fanfare: If an allied Naterran Great Tree is in play, gain Bane.
Frenzied Werewolf.baseFlair:
That person who dealt with us all so honestly, never forgetting why we were here... The one who took such pains to look after. Us. Is that... his. True. Nature? Or. Was. A. Good. Man. Twisted. By. Madness?
—Adventurer's scrawled journal entry
Frenzied Werewolf.evoFlair:
His t-t-t-truuuue. TRUE nature. Is. A. Werewolf.
Change. What will? The journey. Forgotten?
Creeping, creeping. Madness gobbles you up. Chomp, chomp.
—Twisted scrawl

Cougar Pelt Warrior.name: Cougar Pelt Warrior
Cougar Pelt Warrior.baseEffect:
Rush.
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, summon 2 Cougar Pelt Warriors.
Cougar Pelt Warrior.baseFlair: The long-clawed beast's flesh spoils quickly. Leave it a single night and it becomes inedible. Devour it as though pursuing a beast in flight, however, and the meat will melt on your tongue. —Third Berserker's Epitaph: Part 1
Cougar Pelt Warrior.evoFlair: The horned beast's hide can resist those claws. The long-clawed beast's pelt grants speed. Our next hunt's target is set. —Third Berserker's Epitaph: Part 2

Tyrant of Mayhem.name: Tyrant of Mayhem
Tyrant of Mayhem.baseEffect: Fanfare: Draw a card. If Vengeance is not active for you, deal 2 damage to your leader. Otherwise, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.
Tyrant of Mayhem.baseFlair: I am The Devil, master of mayhem. Greed? Impulse? Tyranny requires no justification to exist. Cede to pain. Thrust it upon others, and seize all that you covet.
Tyrant of Mayhem.evoFlair: I am a calamity that rages as my desires dictate. My underlings? All prisoners of war. These wings? My plunder. Pain sustains me, and I shall teach its virtue to the uninitiated.

Demon Commander Laura.name: Demon Commander Laura
Demon Commander Laura.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give an allied follower Storm if Vengeance is active for you.
Demon Commander Laura.baseFlair: Stop dawdling and finish the job already! I expect victory to be all but assured before I step even one foot upon the battlefield, or have you forgotten? Now pulverize them this instant!
Demon Commander Laura.evoFlair: The thick stench of charred flesh in the air, ash raining down across a backdrop of jet-black skies. Yes, a veritable feast for the senses. I may have found my paradise yet.

Endearing Succubus Lilith.name: Endearing Succubus Lilith
Endearing Succubus Lilith.baseEffect: Fanfare: Give your leader the following effect - Whenever your leader takes damage during your turn, recover 1 play point. (This effect lasts until this follower leaves play.)
Endearing Succubus Lilith.baseFlair: Long time no see... Or was it? Hee-hee. Anyway, I bought a new outfit, what do you think? Don't you wanna go on a date? It's gonna be our little secret, okay?
Endearing Succubus Lilith.evoFlair: Come on now, don't be shy. After all, we've already done so much together... What, you don't remember? In that case, I'll just have to show you again.

Girtablilu.name: Girtablilu
Girtablilu.baseEffect: Fanfare: Enhance (9) - If your leader has 19 defense or less, this follower's attack and defense become X. X equals 20 minus your leader's defense.
Girtablilu.evoEffect: Evolve: Gain Storm if your leader has 2 defense or less.
Girtablilu.baseFlair: At the gates of Mashu stands a sentinel—half man, half creature. Seeking fresh offerings for Shamash, it conceals his tail from travelers.
Girtablilu.evoFlair: The verses depict tales of a monster who stands at the divide between the heavens and earth. Despite its sinister appearance, it has more in common with the divine than a monster.

Bear Pelt Warrior.name: Bear Pelt Warrior
Bear Pelt Warrior.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to both leaders. If Avarice is active for you, repeat once.
Last Words: Restore 2 defense to your leader.
Bear Pelt Warrior.evoEffect: Last Words: Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Bear Pelt Warrior.baseFlair: The mountainous beast's flesh was not fit for consumption. But three days later, its odor had become more appetizing, and when I tried it, I found the flavor had greatly improved. —Fifth Berserker's Epitaph: Part 1
Bear Pelt Warrior.evoFlair: Our longtime enemy was brought down by the tusked beast's charge. Armed with the mountainous beast's raw strength, we set our sights upon the king of the wilderness. —Fifth Berserker's Epitaph: Part 2

Mechashot Devil.name: Mechashot Devil
Mechashot Devil.baseEffect: Fanfare: If at least 10 allied Machina followers have been destroyed this match, recover 1 evolution point.
Mechashot Devil.evoEffect: Evolve: If there are at least 2 Machina cards in your hand, give your leader the following effect - At the end of your opponent's turn, summon an Assembly Droid. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Mechashot Devil.baseFlair: The advent of machinery had much to offer us creatures of the night. The most notable gift? A radical form of treatment, which does not extend life but augments it. Perhaps now we can fulfill a long-held dream. Perhaps now we can win back our freedom. —Bloodkin Memoirs
Mechashot Devil.evoFlair: Once they fused their flesh with metal, the nightwalkers knew. "Technology lifts the limits nature imposed on life, and it can lift the limits fate imposed on our race," they said. "Technology can raze all resistance, and it can lead us to freedom." —Purebloods

Ravening Corruption.name: Ravening Corruption
Ravening Corruption.baseEffect: Fanfare: If an allied amulet is in play, deal 2 damage to an enemy follower.
Ravening Corruption.evoEffect: Evolve: Give your leader the following effect - During your turn, whenever cards are added to your hand from your deck, deal 1 damage to a random enemy. Do this X times. X equals the number of cards added to your hand. (This effect is not stackable and lasts for the rest of the match.)
Ravening Corruption.baseFlair:
contagion—spreading from beast. beast—taints life itself. great power. must let someone know. please. spread word quickly. let world know. spread. the madness.
—Scrawled Memo from a Doctor
Ravening Corruption.evoFlair:
I figured it out—the source of madness. It lies within the unknowable self. There is no running from madness. It does not forgive. It is a rope, snaking up your limbs and binding you. May madness fetter all of existence.
—The Rope of Madness

Waltz, King of Wolves.name: Waltz, King of Wolves
Waltz, King of Wolves.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Put a Blood Moon into your hand.
When an allied Blood Moon comes into play, evolve this follower.
Waltz, King of Wolves.baseFlair: We were brutalized and driven to the world's end. The light-dwellers hated us. The night-dwellers scorned us. We can't allow them to live any longer!
Waltz, King of Wolves.evoFlair: Show your true nature, pack members! When the moon shimmers through the darkness, we'll be freed from the chains of reason! Tonight the world will be ours again!

Valnareik, Omen of Lust.name: Valnareik, Omen of Lust
Valnareik, Omen of Lust.baseEffect:
Fanfare: If Wrath is active for you, gain +1/+1 and Storm, and destroy an enemy follower.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, gain +1/+1.
Valnareik, Omen of Lust.evoEffect: At the start of your opponent's turn, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, gain +1/+1.
Valnareik, Omen of Lust.baseFlair: Should we not love our fellows? When seeds of compassion are planted in the arid fields of the human psyche, is it not lust that fertilizes them? Indeed, this is the trial I will administer to the world.
Valnareik, Omen of Lust.evoFlair: It's difficult to replace the impulses that govern the association of fellows. Short of breath and shorter of logic, all reason disappears. But, in a sense, there's no better opportunity to recover the true self. Indeed, this is the trial I will administer to the world.

Yurius, Traitorous Duke.name: Yurius, Traitorous Duke
Yurius, Traitorous Duke.baseEffect:
Fanfare: If Vengeance is active for you, gain the ability to evolve for 0 evolution points.
Whenever an enemy follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 1 defense to your leader.
Yurius, Traitorous Duke.evoEffect:
Whenever an enemy follower comes into play, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader and restore 1 defense to your leader.
During your turn, whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, restore 4 defense to this follower.
Yurius, Traitorous Duke.baseFlair:
Upon tragedy, a new hope is born. Upon betrayal, a new hand takes hold of power. Only through his determination was he able to cut off the bonds that held him back.
"Consorting with allies is but a crutch for the weak—only the powerful reign supreme on their own!"
Yurius, Traitorous Duke.evoFlair:
Regardless of the people's ignorance of truth, I shall continue down this path. An unstoppable rush of power fills my body... Gone is my former powerless self.
"A tragedy is about to begin... I'll take the throne with my very own hands!"

Kudlak.name: Kudlak
Kudlak.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader and X damage to all enemy followers. X equals this follower's attack.
Last Words: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Put a 3/5 Kudlak into your deck.
Kudlak.evoEffect: Last Words: Deal 1 damage to your leader. Put 3 copies of a 3/5 Kudlak into your deck.
Kudlak.baseFlair: Let us spread pestilence. Let us trample the harvest underfoot. Your bodies are lesions. Your strength, a disease. If you would resist, prepare yourselves. The human who strikes me down will be reviled throughout the ages for their sins.
Kudlak.evoFlair: Let us spread pathology. Let us blight the harvests. Hawthorn stake. White amnion. If you cannot prepare both, you will die. The human who tells me tales of the end will be lauded throughout the ages for their heroism.

Illya, Queen of Night.name: Illya, Queen of Night
Illya, Queen of Night.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Union Burst (10) - Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower. Deal 3 damage to the enemy leader. Restore 3 defense to your leader.
At the start of your opponent's turn, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, gain +1/+1.
After Clashing with an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, fully restore this follower's defense.
Illya, Queen of Night.evoEffect:
At the start of your opponent's turn, if your leader took damage during your previous turn, gain +1/+1.
After Clashing with an enemy follower, if this follower is not destroyed, fully restore this follower's defense.
Illya, Queen of Night.baseFlair: Haahahahahaa! Well done, worm! Very impressive, awakening me! As thanks, perhaps I'll grant you the honor of becoming my servant!
Illya, Queen of Night.evoFlair: Only the queen of the night could ever possess such beauty, such dignity. Kneel at my feet and bask in my presence. You could ask no greater honor than to serve Illya Ornstein!

Blood Rage.name: Blood Rage
Blood Rage.baseEffect:
Deal 3 damage to an enemy follower.
Deal 6 damage instead if Vengeance is active for you.
Blood Rage.baseFlair: Blood will be paid for in blood.

Venomous Bite.name: Venomous Bite
Venomous Bite.baseEffect:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Put a Serpent into your hand.
Venomous Bite.baseFlair: This poison could kill you four times over with more to spare. —Snake handler

Blood Drinker's Brand.name: Blood Drinker's Brand
Blood Drinker's Brand.baseEffect:
Deal 4 damage to a follower and give it Drain if it's a Bloodcraft follower.
If Vengeance is active for you, recover 2 play points.
Blood Drinker's Brand.baseFlair: This time for man has come to an end—let us usher in a new era.

Crimson Desire.name: Crimson Desire
Crimson Desire.baseEffect:
Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Recover 1 evolution point.
Crimson Desire.baseFlair: Thirst for eternity, drink for eternity.

Viper Lash.name: Viper Lash
Viper Lash.baseEffect:
Deal 4 damage to a random enemy follower. Summon a Serpent.
Enhance (6): Summon 4 Serpents instead.
Viper Lash.baseFlair: If bitten by the viper, alert those around you and immediately isolate yourself. It's not to save your life; it's to save theirs. The poison dripping from your open wound will soon attract other snakes. —Creatures That Won't Mind If You Die, Serpents and Such

Cursebrand Strike.name: Cursebrand Strike
Cursebrand Strike.baseEffect:
Deal 4 damage to an enemy follower.
Summon a Cursebrand Vampire.
If Vengeance is active for you, give +1/+1 to all allied followers.
Cursebrand Strike.baseFlair:
May blood and pain blot out the light of the moon.
—Cursebrand Vampire

Sadistic Night.name: Sadistic Night
Sadistic Night.baseEffect:
Deal 2 damage to your leader. Deal 6 damage to an enemy follower.
Enhance (7): Then summon a Beast Dominator.
Sadistic Night.baseFlair: This thirst simply refuses to be quenched... Won't you give me what I crave?

Lethal Blade.name: Lethal Blade
Lethal Blade.baseEffect:
Select an enemy follower. Whenever the follower attacks, it will deal 3 damage to itself.
If Vengeance is active for you, give this effect to all enemy followers instead.
Lethal Blade.baseFlair: The ghostly white blade sliced through the sickly jet darkness, running through its target like a needle through cloth. —"Night", Poems of Cruelty

Trial of the Gorgons.name: Trial of the Gorgons
Trial of the Gorgons.baseEffect:
Summon 2 Serpents.
Randomly put 1 of the following cards into your hand: Venomfang Medusa, Euryale, or Stheno.
Trial of the Gorgons.baseFlair: Our trial is a gift. You should revel in it.

Relinquish Reason.name: Relinquish Reason
Relinquish Reason.baseEffect: Give +2/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your hand. Then if Vengeance is active for you, give +2/+0 to all Bloodcraft followers in your deck.
Relinquish Reason.baseFlair: Only instinct can break the shackles of reason.

Unleash the Nightmare.name: Unleash the Nightmare
Unleash the Nightmare.baseEffect:
Put 2 random followers from your deck into your hand.
Summon a Forest Bat for each non-Machina follower added to your hand. Then summon an Assembly Droid for each Machina follower added to your hand.
Unleash the Nightmare.baseFlair: I had a nightmare, so I woke up, and then I went to the window to make sure it wasn't true, but there they were. Just like in my nightmare. —Boy from the fog-filled village

Demon Song.name: Demon Song
Demon Song.baseEffect:
Deal 2 damage to all enemy followers.
If an allied Trill, Devilish Idol is in play, deal 3 damage instead.
Demon Song.baseFlair:
"I want your full attention, from the opening bars to the very last note! If you're talking in the back row... I'll find you."
—Trill, Devilish Idol

Demon Key.name: Demon Key
Demon Key.baseEffect:
Countdown (5)
Whenever your leader takes damage during your turn, subtract 1 from this amulet's Countdown.
Last Words: At the start of your next turn, randomly put 1 of the highest-cost followers from your hand into play.
Demon Key.baseFlair: Drip, drop, drink, drink, key to the door to carnality! Bones, blood, bodies, breath, come hither unto me! —Bloodlock Manuscript

Throne of Solitude.name: Throne of Solitude
Throne of Solitude.baseEffect:
Countdown (4)
At the end of your turn, if only 1 allied follower is in play, give a random allied follower +1/+1 and Ward.
Throne of Solitude.baseFlair: A king of men rules through the favor of his subjects, his path strewn with the petals of his citizens' respect. The king of blood, however, rules through the favor of the night, his path paved with individual ambition.

Sanguine Core.name: Sanguine Core
Sanguine Core.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Recover 1 evolution point.
During your turn, when an allied follower evolves, restore 10 defense to your leader, then banish this amulet.
Sanguine Core.baseFlair: An orb of concentrated blood. Those who seek completion find themselves drawn to its luster.

Prison of Pain.name: Prison of Pain
Prison of Pain.baseEffect:
Countdown (2)
Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader and draw a card.
At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to your leader and draw a card.
Prison of Pain.baseFlair:
Using pain as a tool to oppress the people? Utterly preposterous. This is merely a bit of good old-fashioned torture as decreed by the heavens, indeed.
—Heretic Priest

Dire Bond.name: Dire Bond
Dire Bond.baseEffect:
Countdown (3)
Fanfare: Deal 6 damage to your leader.
At the start of your turn, restore 2 defense to your leader and draw a card.
Dire Bond.baseFlair: The taste of sin is bittersweet.

Blood Moon.name: Blood Moon
Blood Moon.baseEffect:
Countdown (4)
Fanfare: Activate Vengeance for you even if your leader's defense is more than 10. This effect lasts until this amulet leaves play.
Blood Moon.baseFlair: Thus begins a night of inhumanity.

Unselfish Grace.name: Unselfish Grace
Unselfish Grace.baseEffect:
Countdown (5)
At the end of your turn, restore 1 defense to your leader. If you have more evolution points than your opponent, restore 2 defense instead. (You have 0 evolution points on turns you are unable to evolve.)
Last Words: Summon a 4-play point 4/4 XIV. Luzen, Temperance (without Accelerate).
Unselfish Grace.baseFlair:
Open your eyes to the nonsense flooding this world.
All one needs is the life pulse of the heart.
Not love, nor anger, nor sorrow. 'Tis all...
Meaningless.

Dark General.name: Dark General
Dark General.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain Storm if Vengeance is active for you.
Dark General.baseFlair: Hear me, allies. Our time has come to retake our place from the vile mortals! May our fury lead us to victory!
Dark General.evoFlair: Allies one and all, the moon drips red for us! Tonight we purge the world of this human scourge and reclaim our blood right!

Exella, Dark General.name: Exella, Dark General
Exella, Dark General.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain Storm if Vengeance is active for you.
Exella, Dark General.evoEffect: (This card will be treated as Dark General.)
Exella, Dark General.baseFlair: Hear me, allies. Our time has come to retake our place from the vile mortals! May our fury lead us to victory!
Exella, Dark General.evoFlair: Allies one and all, the moon drips red for us! Tonight we purge the world of this human scourge and reclaim our blood right!

Raging Giant.name: Raging Giant
Raging Giant.baseEffect: Fanfare: Gain +2/+0 if Vengeance is active for you.
Raging Giant.baseFlair: Pain leads to anger; anger leads to power. Nothing is more ferocious than a wounded giant.
Raging Giant.evoFlair: Pain leads to anger; anger leads to power. A giant, once drunk on blood, is unstoppable.

Barbaric Demon.name: Barbaric Demon
Barbaric Demon.baseEffect: Strike: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Barbaric Demon.evoEffect: Strike: Deal 2 damage to your leader.
Barbaric Demon.baseFlair: I have made a blood oath to fight by your side, and I shall do so until your dying day.
Barbaric Demon.evoFlair: I have made a blood oath to fight by your side, and I shall do so until your soul departs this world.

Moriana the Bejeweled.name: Moriana the Bejeweled
Moriana the Bejeweled.baseEffect: Fanfare: Recover 1 evolution point if Vengeance is active for you.
Moriana the Bejeweled.baseFlair: So this is one of the prism stones. It's beautiful. The warding magic within is sure to keep anyone safe. Would you like to take it with you?
Moriana the Bejeweled.evoFlair: I've never given anyone a present before, but I'd like you to have this, hero. I hope you like it. It's something my first friends and I found together: a prism stone.

Assault Werewolf.name: Assault Werewolf
Assault Werewolf.baseEffect: Clash: Gain Bane until the end of the turn if the enemy follower has Ward.
Assault Werewolf.evoEffect: Clash: Gain Bane until the end of the turn if the enemy follower has Ward.
Assault Werewolf.baseFlair: "If you value your life, take off your armor." With the werewolf warriors before him, the elderly commander muttered the order. "Those beasts go after the ones who are harder to crush first."
Assault Werewolf.evoFlair: "If you value your life, do not resist." The elderly commander curled his lips back as he put his hands up. "If they think you're easy to crush, your life will be spared."

Devil Hand.name: Devil Hand
Devil Hand.baseEffect: Fanfare: Enhance (7) - Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower, and give a random allied follower +2/+2.
Devil Hand.baseFlair: Groar... (As an all-powerful demon known across the netherworld, a great offering is required to summon me properly. Otherwise, this is what you receive.)
Devil Hand.evoFlair: Groargh... (That summoner has run off... I must find them to return to the netherworld. This form is so cumbersome though... I could really use another hand!)

Swordserpent Guardian.name: Swordserpent Guardian
Swordserpent Guardian.baseEffect:
Fanfare: Summon 2 Serpents.
Fanfare: Enhance (8) - Give Bane and Rush to all allied Serpents.
Swordserpent Guardian.baseFlair: The serpent's path is winding. What business have you in this cave, little lost sheep? Very well. I shall guide you to the serpent god you seek.
